# Loading packages

```{r}

library("tidyverse")
library("scales")
library("patchwork")

source(file = "R/99_proj_func.R")

```

# Loading data files

```{r}

data_clean <- read_csv("data/data_clean.csv")

```

# Creating the plots

```{r}

p1 <- data_clean |>
  asc_CDs_boxplot(lineage = "B cells",
                  hierarchy_level = 3,
                  tissue = "blood",
                  measure = MedQb)

p2 <- data_clean |>
  asc_CDs_boxplot(lineage = "B cells",
                  hierarchy_level = 3,
                  tissue = "blood",
                  measure = CVQb)

p1 / p2
```
